headline: ComEd Hosting Capacity Map Now Updated Monthly to Enhance Interconnection Process for Solar Developers
summary: CHICAGO, November 08, 2024--Rising interest among consumers to reduce their carbon footprints and energy costs is driving the growth of community and rooftop solar in ComEd’s northern Illinois region, and its new hosting capacity map for solar developers is helping streamline the process and meet the demand.
